column4: could somebody suggest a simple app to turn create .wav files using my microphone?
Sounds recorder which comes with Ubuntu?
You can also try the command line utility 'arecord' which is ALSA's recording utility.
tyvm.  I'll look into both of those.  either of them have push-to-talk?
arecord starts recording as soon as the app runs, gnome-sound-recorder has a record button.
